sections.title: Our Story
paragraphs: In 1985, the Rossini family opened the doors of Mare Azzurro, a small restaurant with a great passion for traditional cuisine.
Generation after generation, we have preserved our family recipes, carrying on a legacy of authentic flavors and warm hospitality.

image.overlayText: The first restaurant location with original tables

sections.title: The Tradition of Pasta
paragraphs: Every morning our chefs start preparing fresh pasta following artisanal methods passed down by Grandma Maria.
Our secret? The dough is kneaded by hand for at least 15 minutes, ensuring the perfect texture.

image.overlayText: We prepare fresh pasta every day

sections.title: Seafood Delights
paragraphs: Our seafood dishes come from local fishermen, selected every day at dawn in the port of Sorrento.
We only use fresh ingredients, processed the same day to bring the sea straight to your plate.

sections.title: The Wood-Fired Oven
paragraphs: Our wood-fired oven is lit early in the morning, giving our pizza the authentic taste that only traditional cooking can provide.
We only use olive wood and stone-milled flours for a crispy and fragrant result.

image.overlayText: Pizza baked in a wood-fired oven

sections.title: Family Desserts
paragraphs: Each dessert tells a story: baba, lemon delight, pastieraâ€¦ all prepared following the original recipes.
We use only natural ingredients, such as Sorrento lemons and fresh ricotta from the local dairy.

sections.title: The Wine Cellar
paragraphs: Our wine selection complements each dish with balance and character.
From the hills of Vesuvius to the vineyards of the Coast, we choose only local producers who respect tradition.

image.alt: Bottles of wine in the cellar

sections.title: Hospitality
paragraphs: Welcoming with a smile is our first ingredient.
Every customer is part of our family, and we strive to make them feel at home.

sections.title: Seasons on the Plate
paragraphs: We follow the rhythm of the seasons, adapting our menu to what the land and sea offer.
Spring, summer, autumn, and winter: each dish has its special moment.

sections.title: Cooking Classes
paragraphs: We share our passion by teaching how to prepare traditional dishes.
Our classes are open to everyone: from curious children to tourists in love with Italian cuisine.

image.overlayText: Classes to discover the secrets of our cuisine

sections.title: A Journey in Flavors
paragraphs: Each dish is a sensory journey through flavors, aromas, and memories.
Visiting us means immersing yourself in an authentic experience, where every bite tells a story.
